starvationevasion.client.Networking

Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.Networking.Messenger

  • public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends and receives messages to the server

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.net.Socket clientSide 
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream messageReceiver 
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream messageSender 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Messenger(java.net.Socket clientSide)
      The messenger class is used to communicate with the server in the form of both receiving and sending Serializable message objects through the specified socket.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Serializable receive()
      Listens for server messages on the socket indefinitely.
      void send(MessageContainer container)
      Used for sending a Message object to the server in the form of the contents of a MessageContainer.

        public Messenger(java.net.Socket clientSide)
        The messenger class is used to communicate with the server in the form of both receiving and sending Serializable message objects through the specified socket.

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public java.io.Serializable receive()
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Listens for server messages on the socket indefinitely.
        Returns:
        A newly received message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - In case stream is broken.
